Package overview and introduction

MRcare-package MRcare
A short title line describing what the package does

Main Functions

Primary functions for MR analysis

mr_care()
CARE Mendelian Randomization Analysis
RIVW()
Robust Invalid Variance Weighted Estimator
CARE2_boot()
CARE Bootstrap Analysis

Data Processing

Functions for preprocessing GWAS data

preprocess_gwas_data()
Preprocess GWAS Summary Statistics for MRcare

Configuration

Configuration functions

configure_mrcare()
Configure MRcare Environment
get_mrcare_config()
Get MRcare Configuration
check_hf_connection()
Check Hugging Face Connection

Visualization

Functions for visualizing results

plot_care()
Plot MR-CARE Results
plot_scatter()
Plot MR Scatter Plot
plot_funnel()
Funnel Plot for MR Analysis
plot_combined()
Plot Combined MRcare Analysis Results

Utility Functions

Helper functions and methods

summary(<mrcare>)
Summarize MRcare Analysis Results
print(<mrcare>)
Print method for summary.mrcare objects
format_care_results()
Format CARE Analysis Results
extract_independent_variants()
Extract Independent Variants (Updated to use configuration)
